description: Pgsty Postgres exporter Dashboard for important postgreSQL metrics

panels.description: Transactions committed + roolback per minute
panels.title: Transaction rate

panels.description:
Statements executed per Minute.

Requires `pg_stat_statements` extension.
panels.title: Query rate

panels.description: Shared buffer hits vs reads from disc
panels.title: Shared Buffer Hits

panels.description: Percentage of max_connections used
panels.title: Connections used

panels.description: Transaction committed vs rollbacked
panels.title: Commit Ratio

panels.description: Clients executing Statements.
panels.title: Active clients

panels.description: Requires `pg_stat_statements` extension.
panels.title: Average query runtime

panels.description: Size of all databases in $serviceStack, excluding `wal` and `log`.
panels.title: Total database size

panels.description:
Max Replication lag behind master in seconds

Only available on a standby system.
panels.title: Max Replication Lag

panels.description:
Setting: max_connections in postgreSQL.conf

For HA clusters, shows total value between all nodes.
panels.title: Max Connections

panels.description: Spacer
1 Minute rate of transactions committed or rollback.
panels.title: Transactions

panels.description:
* blk_read_time: Time spent reading data file blocks by backends in this database, in milliseconds
* blk_write_time: Time spent writing data file blocks by backends in this database, in milliseconds

`track_io_timings` needs to be activated
panels.title: I/O Read/Write time

panels.description:
* tup_fetched: rows needed to satisfy queries
* tup_returned: rows read/scanned
panels.title: Tuples fetched/returned

panels.description:
Lag behind master in seconds.

Only available on a standby System.
panels.title: Replication lag

panels.description:
Should be 0 

Source: pg_stat_database

With log_lock_waits turned on, deadlocks will be logged to the PostgreSQL Logfiles.
panels.title: Deadlocks by database

panels.description:
Should be 0.

If temporary files are created, it can indicate insufficient work_mem. With log_temp_files the creation of temporary files are logged to the PostgreSQL Logfiles.
panels.title: Temporary files by database

panels.description: Transactions committed + roolback per minute
panels.title: Transaction rate

panels.description: Shared buffer hits vs reads from disc

targets.expr:
sum(pg_db_blks_hit{$baseFilter, datname="$database"})
/
(
    sum(pg_db_blks_hit{$baseFilter, datname="$database"})
    +
    sum(pg_db_blks_read{$baseFilter, datname=~"$database"})
)

panels.title: Shared Buffer Hits

panels.description: Transaction committed vs rollbacked

targets.expr:
sum(pg_db_xact_commit{$baseFilter, datname="$database"})
/
(
    sum(pg_db_xact_commit{$baseFilter, datname="$database"})
    +
    sum(pg_db_xact_rollback{$baseFilter, datname="$database"})
)

panels.title: Commit Ratio

panels.description: 1 Minute rate of transactions committed or rollback.
panels.title: Transactions

panels.description:
* tup_fetched: rows needed to satisfy queries
* tup_returned: rows read/scanned
panels.title: Tuples fetched/returned

panels.description:
Should be 0 

With log_lock_waits turned on, deadlocks will be logged to the PostgreSQL Logfiles.
panels.title: Deadlocks by database

panels.description:
Should be 0.

If temporary files are created, it can indicate insufficient work_mem. With log_temp_files the creation of temporary files are logged to the PostgreSQL Logfiles.
panels.title: Temporary files by database

list.description:
Select which Zerops project to display (only relevant for central Prometheus setups). 
Uses project ID since project names can change.
list.name: projectId

list.description: Select a specific region (applies only to multi-region projects).
list.name: region

list.description: Select a specific region (applies only to multi-region projects).
list.name: instanceId

list.description: Select the correct service stack ID when multiple stacks share the same name (from deletion/recreation).
list.name: serviceStackId

list.description: Common filter shared across most graphs.
list.name: baseFilter

title: PostgreSQL
